name: Northstar Network
overview: Northstar Network Ltd. is a Canadian ISO 9001:2000 Registered Defence, Aerospace, Marine and Homeland Security contractor. Combined with Northstar’s “in house” electronic contract manufacturing, assembly, and system integration capabilities in Newfoundland, they have affiliate agreements in place with over twenty Defence and Aerospace Companies and several world-class educational institutions spanning from Vancouver, British Columbia to St. John’s, Newfoundland. These affiliates provide Northstar with approximately 2,000 professional and support personnel at its disposal. The Network comprises research and development, engineering and manufacturing capabilities embodied in strategic partnerships with suppliers of goods and services. As a large entity, it is capable of identifying, acquiring and delivering competitive technological solutions. Northstar Network is a wholly owned subsidiary of Northstar Electronics Inc., a Delaware Corporation trading as NEIK and quoted on the OTCBB.

milestones.description: Northstar Electronics Subsidiary Receives Additional $9.1 Million to Its P-3 Master Purchase Order with Lockheed Martin
milestones.source_description: Northstar Electronics Subsidiary Receives Additional $9.1 Million to Its P-3 Master Purchase Order with Lockheed Martin
